name: Starterpool
description: What is the project about? Starterpool is a decentralized launchpad platform for launching new projects on multiple blockchains. What makes your project unique? Our project stands out with dynamic profit sharing, cross-chain interoperability, and a strong community. History of your project. The project was created by former Microsoft developers and has a successful track record of launching projects. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Next, we plan to expand our partnerships, list on more exchanges, and bring more innovative projects to the platform. What can your token be used for? Our token (SPOL) can be used for participation in presales, staking for rewards, and as a governance token for decision-making in the platform.
